TextLibrary.Text: Aha! You bring me the axe! You are brave AND honest!
Aha! You bring me the axe! You are brave AND honest!
Aha! You bring me the axe! You are brave AND honest!
Aha! You bring me the axe! You are brave AND honest!
Thank you, thank you. This will fetch a fine price on Marketday. Neehi has decided you are worthy of the title Master Merchant for going places where Neehi cannot!
